tool_description: Estimates transaction costs including trading fees, slippage, and market impact for proposed cryptocurrency trades across different exchanges.

trade_quantities.description: Quantities to trade for each symbol

error_messages: Array length mismatch: trade_symbols and trade_quantities must have the same length.
Invalid trade quantity: All trade quantities must be positive numbers.
Unsupported exchange: One or more exchanges in exchange_preferences are not supported.
Invalid urgency level: urgency_level must be one of: low, medium, high.
Liquidity insufficient: Insufficient market liquidity for one or more large trades.
usage: Provide trade_symbols and corresponding trade_quantities. Optionally specify exchange_preferences and urgency_level. Returns detailed cost breakdown and execution recommendations.

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost in base currency

fee_breakdown.description: Trading fees for each proposed trade
